concept.title: 239.7305 239.7304 (B) THE INDIVIDUALS AUTHORIZED AT PARAGRAPH (A) MAY NOT DELEGATE THE AUTHORITY TO TAKE THE ACTIONS AT 239.7305 OR THE RESPONSIBILITY FOR MAKING THE DETERMINATION REQUIRED BY 239.7304 TO AN OFFICIAL BELOW THE LEVEL OFâ€”

conbody.p: (1) For the Department of Defense, the Under Secretary of Defense for Acquisition and Sustainment; and
(2) For the military departments, the service acquisition executive for the department concerned.
